title: Calling all UK Elfs - Shopping Assistance
content:
So I just saw this post on engadget.com for perhaps the coolest most useless item I’ve seen in a while and it’s a perfect gift for a buddy of mine. . .

[http://www.marksandspencer.com/IWCatProductPage.process?Merchant\_Id=1&Se...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030193523/http:/www.marksandspencer.com/IWCatProductPage.process?Merchant_Id=1&Section_Id=8349&Product_Id=1900505 "http://www.marksandspencer.com/IWCatProductPage.process?Merchant\_Id=1&Section\_Id=8349&Product\_Id=1900505")

Problem is, they only ship within the UK and I’m in the states . . . Are there any generous UK residents that would assist me in the purchase of this item so it could be shipped over?

Thanks in advance for your assistance even if this is a little off topic, it always reminds me type is truly an international community . . .

Stuart :D

 [‹ Adding glyphs to Times New Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030193523/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16612 "Go to previous forum topic") [henna style ornaments ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030193523/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16548 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Diner

comments.content:
Stuart I’ve ordered one for you (being sent to my dad’s house). Do you need it forwarded before Christmas?

Was Surprised these were still in stock as they were mentioned here yesterday on this far-too-addictive gadget blog - [http://www.engadget.com/entry/1234000067070759/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030193523/http:/www.engadget.com/entry/1234000067070759/ "http://www.engadget.com/entry/1234000067070759/")

Si

Sweet! Thanks Si! I’ll write you off list to discuss the details!

Best,  
Stuart :D
